description: The function 'draw_polygon_scale' generates a visual representation of two polygons (an original and a scaled version) side by side, each with their respective measurements and vertex labels. This is used for educational purposes, specifically for teaching scale factor determination in geometry.

educational_standards.description: Solve problems involving computing actual lengths and areas from a scale drawing.

educational_standards.display_name: Area and Perimeter from Scale Drawings
educational_standards.description: Solve problems involving computing perimeter or areas from a scale drawing.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: Scaled Polygons
stimulus_type_specification.description: The 'draw_polygon_scale' function can generate images of two polygons, an original and its scaled version, side by side. It accepts inputs such as the type of polygon, labels for the polygons and their vertices, a scale factor, and measurements for the polygons' sides. The function has constraints such as the scale factor being greater than 0 and less than or equal to 5. The visualization serves an educational purpose, being used in teaching scale factor determination in geometry.

details: polygon_type: Type of polygon to draw
original_polygon_label: Label for the original polygon
scaled_polygon_label: Label for the scaled polygon
scale_factor: The scale factor used to transform the original polygon
original_vertex_labels: Vertex labels for the original polygon
scaled_vertex_labels: Vertex labels for the scaled polygon
original_visible_sides: Names of sides whose measurements are displayed on the original polygon
scaled_visible_sides: Names of sides whose measurements are displayed on the scaled polygon
The scale factor must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 5
The function draws two polygons (an original and a scaled version) side by side
Each polygon has its respective measurements and vertex labels
The visual output is affected by the input parameters such as the type of polygon, labels, scale factor, and measurements
